doing: What are you doing right now?
withAnyoneElse: Is there anyone else with you?
thoughts: What are you thinking about right now?
A4: We will show you a list of words describing different feelings and emotions. Indicate to what extent you feel this way right now.
socialConcern: What is your major social concern right now?
socialConcernHowAffected: On a scale from 1 to 10, how much are you affected by [major social concern]?
B3: We will show you a list of words describing different feelings and emotions. Indicate to what extent [social concern] makes you feel right now.
socialConcernSpoken: Have you spoken with someone about [major social concern] recently?
socialConcernSpokeTo: Who did you talk to about [socal concern]?
socialConcernConfidant: What is the name of the person?
socialConcernChangeScale: How much did talking about [social concern] with [name of the person] changed what you think about it?
socialConcernChange: Do you feel worse or better after you talked about [major social concern]?
B4f: Have you spoken with someone else about [major social concern] recently?
shareWith: Would you please share [FB Page link] with [name of all the people mentioned previously]?
